pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhuniyo aciravatiyā nadiyā vesiyāhi saddhiṃ naggā ekatitthe nahāyanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.4: “kiṃ nu kho nāma tumhākaṃ, ayye, daharānaṃ brahmacariyaṃ ciṇṇena, nanu nāma kāmā paribhuñjitabbā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.5: Yadā jiṇṇā bhavissatha tadā brahmacariyaṃ carissatha.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.6: Evaṃ tumhākaṃ ubho atthā pariggahitā bhavissantī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.8: Atha kho tā bhikkhuniyo upassayaṃ gantvā bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.11: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.12: “tena hi, bhikkhave, bhikkhunīnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessāmi dasa atthavase paṭicca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:1.15: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:2.1.6: anivatthā vā apārutā vā nahāyati, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
